    • Method Detail

      • createRuralHouse

        RuralHouse createRuralHouse(java.lang.String description,
                            java.lang.String city)
                     throws DuplicatedEntityException
        Creates a rural house and stores it in the data base.
        Parameters:
        description - the name of the rural house
        city - the name of the city
        Returns:
        the created rural house, null if none was created
        Throws:
        DuplicatedEntityException - If is attempted to create an existing entity

      • createOffer

        Offer createOffer(RuralHouse ruralHouse,
                  java.util.Date firstDay,
                  java.util.Date lastDay,
                  float price)
           throws OverlappingOfferException,
                  BadDatesException
        Creates an offer and stores it in the data base.
        Parameters:
        ruralHouse - the rural house that the offer is going to apply
        firstDay - the start date of the offer
        lastDay - the ending date of the offer
        price - the price of the offer
        Returns:
        the created offer, null if none was created
        Throws:
        OverlappingOfferException - If the entered date interval overlaps with already existing offer date
        BadDatesException - If the first date is greater than second date

      • createUser

        User createUser(java.lang.String username,
                java.lang.String password,
                User.Role role)
         throws DuplicatedEntityException
        Creates an user and stores it in the data base.
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the account
        password - the password of the account
        role - the role assigned to the account
        Returns:
        the created user, null if none was created
        Throws:
        DuplicatedEntityException - If is attempted to create an existing entity

      • getAllRuralHouses

        java.util.Vector<RuralHouse> getAllRuralHouses()
        This method retrieves the existing rural houses
        Returns:
        a Vector of rural houses

      • getOffers

        java.util.Vector<Offer> getOffers(RuralHouse rh,
                                  java.util.Date firstDay,
                                  java.util.Date lastDay)
        This method obtains the offers of a ruralHouse in the provided date interval
        Parameters:
        ruralHouse - the rural house that the offer is applied to
        firstDay - the start date of the offer
        lastDay - the ending date of the offer
        Returns:
        a Vector of offers that are contained in those date range, or null if there is no offers

      • login

        void login(java.lang.String username,
           java.lang.String password)
    throws AuthException,
           javax.security.auth.login.AccountNotFoundException
        Login the user with the account that matches the entered username and password
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the account
        password - the password of the account
        Throws:
        AuthException - If the authentication is failed
        javax.security.auth.login.AccountNotFoundException - If no such account is found
